mapper.select: select tae.*,tu.username adminName,ta.nickname from t_apply_enchashment tae LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tae.admin_id=tu.id LEFT JOIN t_account ta ON tae.account_id=ta.id where is_delete!=1 and ta.nickname like concat('%',#{nickname},'%') and tu.username like concat('%',#{adminName},'%') and tae.audit_status=#{auditStatus} and transfer_status!=1 and tae.apply_time >= #{startDate} and tae.apply_time <= #{endDate} and tae.audit_time >= #{auditTime1} and tae.audit_time <= #{auditTime2} ORDER BY tae.apply_time DESC limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

select count(tae.id) from t_apply_enchashment tae LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tae.admin_id=tu.id LEFT JOIN t_account ta ON tae.account_id=ta.id where is_delete!=1 and ta.nickname like concat('%',#{nickname},'%') and tu.username like concat('%',#{adminName},'%') and tae.audit_status=#{auditStatus} and tae.apply_time >= #{startDate} and tae.apply_time <= #{endDate} and tae.audit_time >= #{auditTime1} and tae.audit_time <= #{auditTime2}
mapper.insert: insert into t_apply_enchashment ( id ,account_id ,alipay_account ,audit_status ,audit_time ,admin_id ,reject_reason ,amount ,apply_time ,is_delete ,transfer_status ) values ( id ,#{accountId} ,#{alipayAccount} ,#{auditStatus} ,#{auditTime} ,#{adminId} ,#{rejectReason} ,#{amount} ,#{applyTime} ,#{isDelete} ,#{transferStatus} )
mapper.update: update t_apply_enchashment set id=#{id} ,account_id=#{accountId} ,alipay_account=#{alipayAccount} ,audit_status =#{auditStatus} ,audit_time=#{auditTime} ,admin_id=#{adminId} ,reject_reason=#{rejectReason} ,amount=#{amount} ,apply_time=#{applyTime} ,is_delete=#{isDelete} ,transfer_status=#{transferStatus} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select tae.* ,tu.username adminName,ta.nickname from t_apply_enchashment tae LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON tae.admin_id=tu.id LEFT JOIN t_account ta ON tae.account_id=ta.id where tae.id=#{id}
select tae.* from t_apply_enchashment tae where tae.id=#{id} and is_delete!=1
mapper.delete: delete from t_apply_enchashment where 1=1 and id=#{id} and account_id=#{accountId}
mapper.select: select tae.id,tae.account_id,tae.audit_status,tae.amount,tae.apply_time,tae.alipay_account from t_apply_enchashment tae where tae.account_id=#{accountId} and tae.audit_status=0 and tae.is_delete!=1 ORDER BY tae.apply_time DESC limit 0,1
